"The Pitch Black Province":
"We have observed some pollution in the
Shironian city on planet Harkotan.
In addition to these anomalous observations,
we have detected Kuronites and Darkers.
This may be an attack on the city.

All ARKS, investigate the anomalous
phenomenon and subdue the Kuronites.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"
